title: Cannot receive RP
body: I redeemed 30 dollars RP using subway cards but only recieved 1020 RP. What am i suppose to do now{{champion:32}}

replies.body:
That's certainly a strange and frustrating outcome of purchasing RP! If you [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with our billing specialists, we'll be able to investigate further. 

Let me know if you have any questions.
